item.title: SC
item.description: Security Council Committee Topics: I. The Situation in Hong Kong II. Protecting Women from Violent Extremism and Violent Non-State Actors Committee Documents: Background Guide is available here Staff: Director: Christian Cooper Chair: Caleb Jackson Rapporteur: Caroline Hoffman If you are interested in applying for a staff position for DAYMUNC, please contact the Secretary General.

item.title: GA3
item.description: GA3 Committee Topics: I. Combatting Xenophobia and Systemic Abuse of Muslims and Other Religious Minorities II. Promoting Food Security and Public Health in Yemen Committee Documents: Background Guide is available here Staff: Director: Sam Pugh Chair: Nickii Cottrell Rapporteur: Ivan Mallett If you are interested in applying for a staff position for DAYMUNC, please contact the Secretary General.

item.title: PBC

The Situation in Syria Background Guide will be available soon Staff: Director: Angie Loyd Chair: Rahima Hamadi Rapporteur: Hannah Hays If you are interested in applying for a staff position for DAYMUNC, please contact the Secretary General.
